MITE0000028.reaction_description: The halogenase chlorinates the second bht residue of the balhimycin precursor, probably while the precursor is bound to module 6 of the NRPS. The PCP domain of module 6 might be required for the reaction. The substrate specificity of the enzyme might be less specific than represented in the SMARTS pattern. In order to make the specificity not too broad structures were rather kept in the pattern than left out.

MITE0000033.reaction_description: Adds N-acetylglucosamine or N-acylglucosamine to Hpg4 of the teicoplanin aglycone. Substrate specificity is probably more general than depicted in the reaction SMARTS, but there is no precise information on substrate specificity. In order to avoid making the reaction too general, the complete backbone is included in the pattern.
